about_the_game:
Embark on "Time Journey," an immersive adventure set within the enigmatic confines of an alien laboratory. With no memory of your past or knowledge of your presence in this alien realm, you must explore, solve puzzles, and interact with the environment to uncover the truth about your identity and the purpose of your mysterious surroundings.



Key Features:
• Mysterious Sci-Fi Setting: Explore the complex and secretive corridors of an alien lab, brimming with advanced technology and clandestine secrets eager for discovery.



• Identity Discovery: Piece together your character's background by gathering clues and leveraging the lab's alien tech, weaving a narrative that bridges science fiction with deep personal exploration.



• Engaging Puzzle-Solving: Solve intricate puzzles using the lab's mechanisms, each solution drawing you closer to unraveling the greater mystery at hand.



• Dynamic NPC Interactions: Engage in meaningful dialogue with a host of NPC characters residing within the lab. These interactions can provide valuable insights, reveal underlying lore, and influence the course of your journey.

"Time Journey" is a thought-provoking exploration and puzzle-solving game set against a science fiction backdrop. As players navigate through the alien laboratory, they will encounter various NPCs, each with their own stories and information that can aid in piecing together the player's past and the lab's mysteries. Time manipulation plays a crucial role in both puzzle-solving and narrative progression, offering a unique twist on traditional gameplay mechanics.

name: TIME JOURNEY

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: i3
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics

short_description: This game is perfect for players who relish sci-fi mysteries, engaging storylines, and intellectual challenges. "Time Journey" invites you to decipher the secrets of your identity and the alien lab, making every discovery a step closer to the truth.
supported_languages:
English*, Russian
*languages with full audio support
